mapper.sql: id, title, create_time, update_time, create_user_id, vote_up, vote_down, language
mapper.select: select id from t_question where original_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, original_id from t_question where description = '?'
select id, description from t_question where !ISNULL(description) and description_ch = '?'
select id, title from t_question where !ISNULL(title) and (ISNULL(title_ch) or title_ch = '?')
mapper.insert:
insert into t_question
id,
title,
create_time,
update_time,
create_user_id,
vote_up,
vote_down,
language,
description,

mapper.update:
update t_question
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title_ch = #{titleCh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
vote_up = #{voteUp,jdbcType=INTEGER},
vote_down = #{voteDown,jdbcType=INTEGER},
language = #{language,jdbcType=INTEGER},
description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
description_ch = #{descriptionCh,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_question set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, vote_up = #{voteUp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, vote_down = #{voteDown,jdbcType=INTEGER}, language = #{language,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_question set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, vote_up = #{voteUp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, vote_down = #{voteDown,jdbcType=INTEGER}, language = #{language,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
